column1: Vol. 4. No. 20. Pg. 345. Oxford: Exeter college.
This issue contains the poem '[[From the many-willow'd margin of the immemorial Thames]]' (p. 11).
This issue contains the poem '[[The Happy Mariners]]' (pp. 69-70).
The poem was reprinted in a revised form in [[A Northern Venture]] in 1923.
This issue contains two poems published under one overall title: ''Adventures in Unnatural History and Medieval Metres
column2: being the Freaks of Fisiogus'': (i) Fastitocalon
column4: or ye Kinde of ye Oliphaunt.
